subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Robert Stieglitz of Germany retained his World Boxing Organization super middleweight title in Magdeburg, Germany, after his challenger, Khoren Gevor of Armenia, was disqualified in the 10th round for an intentional head butt.
snippet: Robert Stieglitz of Germany retained his World Boxing Organization super middleweight title in Magdeburg, Germany, after his challenger, Khoren Gevor of Armenia, was disqualified in the 10th round for an intentional head butt.
